text: Sister is a 2018 stop motion animated film directed by Siqi Song during her studies at CalArts Experimental Animation Program as her graduation film. In January 2020, it was nominated for the 2020 Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film."Hair Love" wins Best Animated Short Film-Oscars on YouTube2020|Oscars.org ==Accolades== The short has been presented and won awards in a number of festivals including the Oscar Qualifying HollyShorts Film Festival, the Aspen Shortsfest, the Austin Film Festival, and the Foyle Film Festival where it won the 4 different Oscar Qualifying prize for best animation. The short was nominated for the Annie Awards and Shortlisted at the BAFTA Student Film Awards for best student film in 2018. It was also nominated for Best Animated Short Film at the 92nd Academy Awards.Nominees for 2020 Academy Awards announced - WBALTV 11 == Plot == A man thinks back to his childhood memories of growing up with an annoying little sister in China in the 1990s.
